content.text: Mere pyare deshvasiyon (My dear fellow citizens), in the last 10 years, we have transformed India's infrastructure completely! From smart cities to bullet trains, from Chandrayaan to 5G, India is not just developing - India is RACING ahead! Previous governments only laid foundation stones, we complete projects. This is Modi ki Guarantee!
